name: NSEntityMapping
desc: A mapping instance that specifies how to map an entity from a source to a destination managed object model.

items.name: var sourceEntityName: String?
items.desc: The source entity name for the entity mapping.

items.name: var sourceEntityVersionHash: Data?
items.desc: The version hash of the source entity for the entity mapping.

items.name: var sourceExpression: NSExpression?
items.desc: The source expression for the entity mapping.

items.name: var destinationEntityName: String?
items.desc: The destination entity name for the entity mapping.

items.name: var destinationEntityVersionHash: Data?
items.desc: The version hash for the destination entity for the entity mapping.

items.name: var name: String!
items.desc: The name of the entity mapping.

items.name: var mappingType: NSEntityMappingType
items.desc: The mapping type for the entity mapping.

items.name: var entityMigrationPolicyClassName: String?
items.desc: The class name of the migration policy for the entity mapping.

items.name: var attributeMappings: [NSPropertyMapping]?
items.desc: The array of attribute mappings for the entity mapping.

items.name: var relationshipMappings: [NSPropertyMapping]?
items.desc: The array of relationship mappings for the entity mapping.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: The user info dictionary for the entity mapping.

items.name: case undefinedEntityMappingType
items.desc: Specifies that the developer handles destination instance creation.

items.name: case addEntityMappingType
items.desc: Specifies that this is a new entity in the destination model.

items.name: case removeEntityMappingType
items.desc: Specifies that this entity is not present in the destination model.

items.name: case copyEntityMappingType
items.desc: Specifies that source instances are migrated as-is.

items.name: case transformEntityMappingType
items.desc: Specifies that entity exists in source and destination and is mapped.
